Name: }bedrock.server.util.string.validate

Parameters.Name: pInputString
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Element name to validate and update if necessary

Parameters.Name: pUndesirableFileSystem
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Undesirable characters for file system (Default = ' /|\\>"<:?*')

Parameters.Name: pChanges
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: String showing what to change (Default = pReplaceIfNotFound)

Parameters.Name: pReplaceIfNotFound
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Replace undesirable characters with this if not specified in pChanges (Default = '_')

Parameters.Name: pMode
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: 1=Validate for File System only, 2=Validate for 1st only, 3=Validate Fully (Default = 3)

Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pJson
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: JSON Object with process parameter values. This will overwrite user passed parameters for all included parameters.
